tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE air_quality_measurements (
    measurement_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    station_id UUID,
    measurement_value FLOAT,
    measurement_time TIMESTAMP,
    CONSTRAINT fk_station_id FOREIGN KEY (station_id) REFERENCES monitoring_stations(station_id)
);

CREATE TABLE air_quality_measurements (
    measurement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    station_id INT,
    measurement_datetime TIMESTAMP,
    pm_2_5_level FLOAT,
    pm_10_level FLOAT,
    ozone_level FLOAT,
    nitrogen_dioxide_level FLOAT,
    sulfur_dioxide_level FLOAT,
    carbon_monoxide_level FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (station_id) REFERENCES monitoring_stations(station_id)
);

CREATE TABLE MonitoringStations (
  station_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  station_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE AirQualityMeasurements (
  measurement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  station_id INT REFERENCES MonitoringStations(station_id),
  measurement_date DATE NOT NULL,
  particulate_matter FLOAT NOT NULL,
  pollutant_level VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE SensorData (
  sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  station_id INT REFERENCES MonitoringStations(station_id),
  measurement_id INT REFERENCES AirQualityMeasurements(measurement_id),
  sensor_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  measurement_value FLOAT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE air_quality_measurements (
    measurement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    station_id INT NOT NULL,
    datetime TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    pm25_level INT,
    pm10_level INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (station_id) REFERENCES monitoring_stations(station_id)
);

CREATE TABLE locations (
    location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    station_id INT NOT NULL,
    city VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    country VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (station_id) REFERENCES monitoring_stations(station_id)
);

CREATE TABLE sensors (
    sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    station_id INT NOT NULL,
    sensor_type VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    sensor_model VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (station_id) REFERENCES monitoring_stations(station_id)
);

CREATE TABLE air_quality_measurements (
    measurement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    station_id INT,
    measurement_date DATE,
    pm25_level FLOAT,
    pm10_level FLOAT,
    temperature FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (station_id) REFERENCES monitoring_stations(station_id)
);

CREATE TABLE measurement_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    measurement_id INT,
    unit_id INT,
    measured_value FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (measurement_id) REFERENCES air_quality_measurements(measurement_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (unit_id) REFERENCES measurement_units(unit_id)
);
